member.name: T:Ncqrs.CommandHandling.AutoMapping.CommandAutoMappingConfiguration
member.summary: Helper methods to get properties and parameter values from commands.

member.name: M:Ncqrs.CommandHandling.AutoMapping.CommandAutoMappingConfiguration.GetParameterValues(Ncqrs.Commands.ICommand,System.Reflection.ParameterInfo[])
member.summary: Gets all the values for the parameters filled with the values from the command.
member.returns: All the values for the parameters.

member.name: M:Ncqrs.CommandHandling.AutoMapping.CommandAutoMappingConfiguration.GetPropertyValueBasedOnParameterInfo(Ncqrs.Commands.ICommand,System.Reflection.ParameterInfo)
member.summary: Gets the property value from the first matched property. The match is made by the name and the type of the specified parameter.
member.remarks: The property match is done by the name and type, where the name is matched case insensitive and the type of the parameter type should be assignable from the property type.
member.exception: Thrown when command or parameterInfo is null.
member.returns: The value from the first matched property.

member.name: M:Ncqrs.CommandHandling.AutoMapping.CommandAutoMappingConfiguration.GetCommandProperties(Ncqrs.Commands.ICommand)
member.summary: Gets all the propertie from the command that should be used in the auto mapping process.
member.remarks: All properties marked with the are ignored.
member.returns: A result set containing all properties that should be used in the auto mapping process.

member.name: T:Ncqrs.CommandHandling.TransactionalInProcessCommandService
member.summary: A service that dispatches Command objects to their appropriate CommandHandler. CommandHandlers can subscribe and unsubscribe to specific types of commands. Only a single handler may be subscribed for a single type of command at any time.
member.remarks: This command service is in process and transactional. The transactional system is based on . Since this service is in process, no additional software of configiration is needed.

Occurs when the was not found for on the given .

Occurs when a was not found for on of the given 's.

requires.description: There should be at least on command to execute.
